actions.text: Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration, S. Rept. 93-747.

official_title: Resolved that the Committee on Rules and Administration is authorized to expend from the contingent fund of the Senate, upon vouchers approved by the chairman of that committee, not to exceed $12,875 for the purchase of twenty-five thousand seven hundred and fifty calendars.

summary.text: Authorizes the Committee on Rules and Administration to expend from the contingent fund of the Senate, upon vouchers approved by the chairman of that committee, not to exceed $12,875 for the purchase of twenty-five thousand seven hundred and fifty calendars.

titles.title: Resolved that the Committee on Rules and Administration is authorized to expend from the contingent fund of the Senate, upon vouchers approved by the chairman of that committee, not to exceed $12,875 for the purchase of twenty-five thousand seven hundred and fifty calendars.
